title: So you just can't get enough of Bill ...
content:
Well you're in luck :)

I'm blogging on issues of ethics, psychology and religion in contemporary life over at the new Reform Jewish web site, [www.RJ.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730212829/http:/www.rj.org/ "www.RJ.org") . It's now up.

First topic: anger. I've been doing an on-line study lately :)
author: William Berkson
